description: Numbers n such that 6*10^n-1 is prime.
comments: Also numbers n such that 5*10^n + 9*R_n is prime, where R_n = 11...1 is the repunit (A002275) of length n.Next term is > 15000. - _Hugo Pfoertner_, Feb 12 2004
links: Makoto Kamada, Prime numbers of the form 599...99.
Index entries for primes involving repunits
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Aug 11 2000
extensions: 3 more terms from Herman Jamke (hermanjamke(AT)fastmail.fm), Dec 30 2007
